com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base

Class SegmentBase<S extends Segment<S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.Segment<S>
      • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.SegmentBase<S>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BytesSegment, LongsSegment

    public abstract class SegmentBase<S extends Segment<S>>
extends Segment<S>
    Shared base class for Segment implementations

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.fasterxml.util.membuf.Segment

        Segment.State

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected S _nextSegment
      Next segment in the segment chain
      protected Segment.State _state 
      static int ABSOLUTE_MINIMUM_LENGTH
      Let's not allow using segments shorter than 8 values; partly to ensure that length prefixes can not be split across more than one segments even for smallest data types (bytes)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SegmentBase() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Method that will erase any content segment may have and reset various pointers: will be called when clearing buffer, the last remaining segment needs to be cleared.
      S finishReading()
      Method called when all contents has been read from this segment.
      S finishWriting()
      Method called when writes to this segment have been completed, which occurs when segment is full, more content is to be written, and another segment is becoming the active write-segment.
      S getNext()
      Accessor for getting the next segment in linked list.
      S initForReading()
      Method called when the segment becomes the active read segment.
      S initForWriting()
      Method called when the segment becomes the active write segment.
      void markFree()
      Method that will forcibly mark segment as free; should only be called when releasing segment to an allocator.
      S relink(S next)
      Method for defining next segment in linked list
      Segment.State state()

        public static final int ABSOLUTE_MINIMUM_LENGTH

        public S initForWriting()
        Description copied from class: Segment
        Method called when the segment becomes the active write segment.

        This state transition must occur from Segment.State.FREE.

      • finishWriting

        public S finishWriting()
        Description copied from class: Segment
        Method called when writes to this segment have been completed, which occurs when segment is full, more content is to be written, and another segment is becoming the active write-segment.

      • initForReading

        public S initForReading()
        Description copied from class: Segment
        Method called when the segment becomes the active read segment. Its state may or may not change, but we do need to create the reader-wrapper for ByteBuffer

        public S finishReading()
        Description copied from class: Segment
        Method called when all contents has been read from this segment. Will return next segment and clear it.

        Returns:
        Next segment after this segment (before clearing link)
